thread.title: Nutley BOE debate set for Tuesday - Education
thread.title_full: Nutley BOE debate set for Tuesday - Education - NorthJersey.com

author: Nutley Sun
title: Nutley BOE debate set for Tuesday - Education
text:
The Democrat and Republican Clubs of Nutley will host a Nutley Board of Education Candidatesâ€™ Debate at 7:30 p.m. Tuesday at the Grace Church Parish House, 200 Highfield Lane. 
Four candidates - incumbents Ryan Kline and Deborah Russo, and newcomers Salvatore Balsamo and Blaire Rzempoluch - are running for three, three-year seats. Board member Brenda Sherman, who is running uncontested for a one-year term, will also be present for questions.
